MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting properties in Wellbank Lane, Cinder Lane, Mill Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.28PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:25AM on 10th February 2021.
